components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: T-Mobile has notified us that their planned maintenance window has been extended. As a result, message processing capacity is reduced, which may cause delays during peak periodsparticularly at the top of the hour. While we expect the overall impact to be minimal, we are actively monitoring the situation and making adjustments as needed. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner if additional information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Sotovaja Svjaz MOTIV

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body:
The Sotovaja Svjaz MOTIV network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 November 2025 at 17:00 PST until 19 November 2025 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Sotovaja Svjaz MOTIV Russia handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 November 2025 at 20:00 PST until 20 November 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 December 2025 at 20:00 PST until 04 December 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 December 2025 at 03:00 PST until 10 December 2025 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom SMS Carrier Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Three network in the United Kingdom is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 17 November 2025 at 15:00 PST until 19 November 2025 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Three United Kingdom handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

17 November 2025 at 15:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 17:00 PST
19 November 2025 at 15:00 PST until 19 November 2025 at 17:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
